titles.title: Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument Access Act
Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument Access Act
Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument Access Act
A bill to provide greater regional access to the Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument in the State of Maine, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
